comment: This (useless) theorem, which was proved without the Axiom of Infinity, demonstrates an artifact of our definition of binary relation, which is meaningful only when its arguments exist. In particular, the antecedent cannot be satisfied unless ` _om ` exists. (Contributed by NM, 13-Nov-2003.)
